document_data.name: ''Umber Hulk Plate''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Umber hulk plate''''' was a type of [[heavy armor]] crafted using [[umber hulk]] chitin and imbued with the creature's natural magic.
document_data.Powers: These plate mails were created through reasonably easy shaping and tampering of umber hulk's shell to a [[humanoid]] form. [[Duergar]] smiths learned the process of curing and reinforcing these dark sets of plates. ''Umber hulk plates'' possessed a ''+2'' enchantment but were somewhat vulnerable to slashing weapons.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, ''umber hulk plates'' were crafted by a [[svirfneblin]] named [[Dirty Llew]] who inhabited a deep gnome camp in the depths of the Lower [[Dorn's Deep]] in the [[Spine of the World]].
